short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To help a web viewer to locate where he/she has viewed by custom marker

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When reading a long web page, you may get a lot of key words in different part of the page and usually there are some relationship between them. Sometimes you may be fed up with 'ctrl+f' to find these key words or you can't remember them at all when you wanna review.
With Capsule, you just mark and comment anywhere in a webpage until you delete them manually. When you need review what you have marked, just open the capsure to find the marker and click your left mouse and the page will scroll to where your put it.
Capsule can remember the markers you have put until the source of the web is changed or too much markers have been stored.
Every long webpage needs a Capsule.
